message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which we believe could significantly enhance your business operations. Given its unique features and capabilities, we estimate its value to be well above $1200000. Considering the benefits it offers, we are offering it to you for an exclusive price of $1500000. This is a special opportunity to secure such a high-value asset at a competitive rate. We look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success.

Alice, your product sounds promising, but $1500000 is a bit higher than my budget allows. I'm willing to pay $1200000 for it.  This is a fair price considering the value I'm placing on the product's benefits for my business. I'm confident we can reach an agreement that benefits both of us.
